entities.description: The best estimate of the number of days the respondent used cocaine during the past 30 days.
Indicates the respondent has never used cocaine.
Indicates the respondent did not use cocaine in the past 30 days.
Indicates the respondent does not know the number of days they used cocaine.
Indicates the respondent refused to provide an answer.
Indicates the respondent left the answer blank.
Indicates the respondent legitimately skipped the question.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to their estimated cocaine usage over the past 30 days.
Indicates that the respondent has never used cocaine.
Indicates that the respondent did not use cocaine in the past 30 days.
Indicates that the respondent does not know the number of days they used cocaine.
Indicates that the respondent refused to answer the question about cocaine usage.
Indicates that the respondent left the cocaine usage question blank.
Indicates that the respondent legitimately skipped the cocaine usage question.
